data.title: Dakine 420 Nutrients
data.meta_description: Maximize your plants' yield & potency. Shop our selection of Dakine 420 base nutrients and supplements at Steins and Vines, South Dakota's original grow shop.
data.text:
Why DaKine 420?

A lot of commercial cannabis nutrients and supplements on the market simply do not have a firm foundation of rigorous research and analysis. Dakine 420, on the other hand, is guided by a real, bona-fide âMad Scientistâ with dual PhDs in chemistry and microbiology, assisted by a group of botanists, chemists, horticultural specialists and other highly-qualified professionals. Together, they have over a half-century of combined experience, working in state-of-the-art indoor growing facilities.

Dakine 420's team has one goal: To create scientifically-proven commercial marijuana nutrients to best maximize your cannabis yield and potency. Our team combines a wealth of knowledge and experience with a practical, roll-up-your-sleeves and get-your-hands-dirty growerâs passion.

Why powdered nutrients?

The advantages are many, starting with a lower shipping cost and longer shelf life than liquid nutrients. With our handy nutrient calculators, you can dial in precise nutrient loads for optimal cannabis yields and THC levels. Superior products, superior results, affordable cannabis and hemp nutrients. Find out why hundreds of growers have made the Dakine 420 Mad Scientist their new best friend!

Tilthy Rich

Tilthy Richâ¢ Calcium is specially formulated to breathe life into your soil, protect plants against disease, heat stress and toxicity, and maintain healthy and active soil structure. Because the soil will be working for you, you will likely be able to gradually reduce the amount and cost of amendments needed to maintain productivity.

pH Up

Strap in and light the fuse, our Ph Up formula is rocket fuel to kick your plants in the acid!

Derived from powdered potassium carbonate, our 0-0-60 100% soluble formula is a safe booster that puts you in the driverâs seat as far toward planet alkaline as you need to go.
